description:
- LEVEL 25 WITH SOUTH, WEST AND NORTH VIEWS
- LARGE 236SQM OF LIVING AREA
- THREE SEPARATE BALCONY SPACES TOTALLING 50 SQM
- STUNNINGLY PRESENTED THROUGHOUT

This opulent 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom sub-penthouse apartment is located on the 25th Floor of the spectacular "Elevation" complex in the heart of Adelaide Terrace and enjoys over 186sqm of internal living space!

Combining the ultimate in unassuming luxury with breathtaking panoramic views, including the city skyline, our picturesque Swan River, Elizabeth Quay, the world-class Optus Stadium and South Perth Esplanade.

Headlined by an expansive floor plan with over 186sqm of internal living space and 3 separate balconies across another 50sqm, it is the ultimate entertainer offering the very best in luxurious inner-city living. Without doubt appealing to a variety of astute buyers, it also offers the perfect proposition for fastidious downsizers looking to step into the easy living, but equally grand, sub-penthouse lifestyle.

A true masterpiece that must be viewed in person to fully appreciate, the features here are endless. However, it is the views that absolutely take centre stage with full height windows, sliding doors and balconies capturing every aspect imaginable. You are therefore privy to the magic of every glorious sunrise and sunset, have front row seats to major events such as the Australia Day sky show, or simply curl up in bed and watch a moody storm roll in- the choice is yours.

FEATURES INCLUDE:
-Expansive open plan yet beautifully zoned living area with panoramic views
-Gourmet kitchen with quality integrated Miele appliances including induction cooktop
-Large double sink, raised feature breakfast bar
-Quality plantation shutters
-Daikin ducted & zoned reverse cycle air conditioning
-Quality shadow-line ceiling cornicing and tall skirting boards throughout
-Opulent Master Suite with large walk-in robe, balcony access & lavish ensuite
-Ensuite with feature vanity, spa bath & ample storage
-Heated towel rails ensuite
-King size bedroom 2 with large built in robe, balcony access & serviced by second bathroom
-King size bedroom 3/guest with built in robe
-Quality floor to ceiling tiling to all wet areas including bathrooms & laundry
-Large separate laundry room with ample storage plus separate guest powder room
-High speed fibre internet & smart wiring/data points throughout
-Secure & exclusive swipe card access to reach your floor level
-Audio visual intercom system

DIMENSIONS
-Internal: 186sqm, Balconies: 50sqm, Store: 4sqm, Car Bays: 26sqm, Total: 266sqm

COMPLEX FEATURES
-Resident building caretaker on-site
-CCTV system for added security
-Secure swipe card access to complex
-Full building lift upgrades completed
-Resident & guest basement parking accessible via Terrace Road & Adelaide Terrace
-Ticketed off road parking also available on Adelaide Terrace

RESORT FACILITIES
-Rooftop heated lap pool, deck & jaw dropping views
-Fully equipped gymnasium on Level 29 also with spectacular views
-Games room and Theatre found on Level 2
-Function room with a full size kitchen on Level 2
-Separate roof top terrace and bathrooms on Level 29

OUTGOINGS
Council Rates: $3,058.85 p/a
Water Rates: $2,802.60p/a
Admin Levy: $2,902.80 p/q
Reserve Levy: $1,325.10 p/q
Total Strata Levies: $4,227.90 p/q

This vibrant ultra-convenient location is only footsteps away from restaurants, nightlife, lush riverside parklands, retail and all the amenities of the CBD. So whether you choose to explore all our great city has to offer by day, hosting your family and friends for sunset balcony cocktails by night, or simply retreating from the outside world in your exclusive slice of penthouse paradise, the possibilities are truly endless.

Call Chris O'Brien on 0452 581 831 today for your exclusive private inspection. This property will not last so do not miss this opportunity!
